name: crochet glasses holder
notes:
> this pattern is available for [free on my blog][1]. the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern, including any tutorial photos, in one printable file without advertisements.

a crochet glasses holder is the perfect solution to keeping your eyewear safe and easily accessible.

having a glasses holder on your nightstand and coffee table will keep your glasses from falling on the floor and getting scratched and you’ll always know right where they are!

**two yarn weight options**
i've included two different yarn weights, double stranded worsted weight yarn and single stranded bulky weight yarn.

**yarn**
lion brand yarns hue & me was used for the cream colored holder 80% acrylic / 20% wool (137 yards / 125 m / 125 g / 4.4 oz) other chunky weight (5)yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met.
lion brand yarn 24/7 cotton was used for the worsted weight sample. (3.5oz / 100 g / 186 yards / 170 meters / 100% mercerized cotton).

crochet glasses holder design is an a crocheted simplicity original design.

join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases, giveaways, sales and testing opportunities: https://www.facebook.com/groups/906744872727855/

you can also find me on etsy (a crocheted simplicity) (jennifer renaud).

all of my patterns are written in standard american terms, unless noted otherwise.

please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds, however, i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions.
